sentence.english: She isn't scoring zero in her exams anymore.
sentence.spanish: Ella ya no saca cero en sus exámenes.

sentence.english: Are they buying one ticket or two?
sentence.spanish: ¿Compran un billete o dos?

sentence.english: He was reading two books last month.
sentence.spanish: Él leía dos libros el mes pasado.

sentence.english: I'm not taking three courses this semester.
sentence.spanish: No tomo tres cursos este semestre.

sentence.english: Were you waiting for four hours at the airport?
sentence.spanish: ¿Esperaste cuatro horas en el aeropuerto?

sentence.english: They are visiting five countries on their trip.
sentence.spanish: Ellos visitan cinco países en su viaje.

sentence.english: Does he work six days a week?
sentence.spanish: ¿Trabaja él seis días a la semana?

sentence.english: She wasn't sleeping seven hours each night.
sentence.spanish: Ella no dormía siete horas cada noche.

sentence.english: Are we meeting at eight o'clock?
sentence.spanish: ¿Nos reunimos a las ocho en punto?

sentence.english: He doesn't have nine siblings.
sentence.spanish: Él no tiene nueve hermanos.

sentence.english: I was living in London ten years ago.
sentence.spanish: Yo vivía en Londres hace diez años.

sentence.english: Are they arriving at eleven in the morning?
sentence.spanish: ¿Llegan a las once de la mañana?

sentence.english: She isn't eating twelve cookies every day.
sentence.spanish: Ella no come doce galletas cada día.

sentence.english: Were there thirteen people at the meeting?
sentence.spanish: ¿Había trece personas en la reunión?

sentence.english: He is learning fourteen new words daily.
sentence.spanish: Él aprende catorce palabras nuevas diariamente.

sentence.english: Do you usually walk fifteen minutes to work?
sentence.spanish: ¿Sueles caminar quince minutos al trabajo?

sentence.english: They weren't paying sixteen pounds for the ticket.
sentence.spanish: Ellos no pagaban dieciséis libras por el billete.

sentence.english: Is she turning seventeen next week?
sentence.spanish: ¿Cumple diecisiete años la próxima semana?

sentence.english: He doesn't work eighteen hours a day anymore.
sentence.spanish: Él ya no trabaja dieciocho horas al día.

sentence.english: Were you studying nineteen chapters for the exam?
sentence.spanish: ¿Estudiaste diecinueve capítulos para el examen?

sentence.english: They are planting twenty trees in the park.
sentence.spanish: Ellos plantan veinte árboles en el parque.

sentence.english: Does he have twenty-one cousins?
sentence.spanish: ¿Tiene él veintiún primos?

sentence.english: She wasn't running thirty kilometres last week.
sentence.spanish: Ella no corría treinta kilómetros la semana pasada.

sentence.english: Are we meeting in thirty-two days?
sentence.spanish: ¿Nos reunimos en treinta y dos días?

sentence.english: He doesn't earn forty thousand pounds a year.
sentence.spanish: Él no gana cuarenta mil libras al año.

sentence.english: Were they waiting for forty-five minutes?
sentence.spanish: ¿Esperaron cuarenta y cinco minutos?

sentence.english: I'm reading fifty pages every day.
sentence.spanish: Leo cincuenta páginas cada día.

sentence.english: Do they have sixty employees in their company?
sentence.spanish: ¿Tienen sesenta empleados en su empresa?

sentence.english: She wasn't paying seventy pounds for the dress.
sentence.spanish: Ella no pagaba setenta libras por el vestido.

sentence.english: Is he turning eighty next birthday?
sentence.spanish: ¿Cumple ochenta años el próximo cumpleaños?

sentence.english: They don't live ninety miles from here.
sentence.spanish: Ellos no viven a noventa millas de aquí.

sentence.english: Were you solving ninety-nine problems for homework?
sentence.spanish: ¿Resolvías noventa y nueve problemas de tarea?

sentence.english: He is writing one hundred words per minute.
sentence.spanish: Él escribe cien palabras por minuto.

sentence.english: Does she have one hundred and twenty-five followers?
sentence.spanish: ¿Tiene ella ciento veinticinco seguidores?

sentence.english: They weren't spending one thousand pounds on holiday.
sentence.spanish: Ellos no gastaban mil libras en vacaciones.

english: Two thousand, four hundred and fifty

sentence.english: Are you earning two thousand, four hundred and fifty pounds per month?
sentence.spanish: ¿Ganas dos mil cuatrocientos cincuenta libras al mes?

sentence.english: He doesn't have one million pounds in the bank.
sentence.spanish: Él no tiene un millón de libras en el banco.

sentence.english: Were they investing one billion dollars in the project?
sentence.spanish: ¿Invertían mil millones de dólares en el proyecto?
